format:

    echo: false
---

```{r}
#| label: tbl-members
#| tbl-cap: "List of ClimED members"

library(reactable)
tab3 <- read.csv("table_members.csv")
reactable(
  tab3,
  resizable = TRUE,
  sortable = TRUE,
  wrap = FALSE,
  pagination = FALSE,
  columns = list(
    Country = colDef(name = "Nation"),
    Email = colDef(name = "Email Address"),
    Data = colDef(name = "Data Provided"),
    Outcome = colDef(name = "Type of Outcome")
    ),
  outlined = TRUE,
  striped = TRUE
          )
```
